title: Stuck in match screen, not even leaving helps.

embed.description: Uploaded by Totally not Anthony on 2016-01-21.

body:
me and 5 friends queued and one of their internet's dc'd while match was preparing, now we stuck on this screen and when we leave it dosent let us reconnect either.

this problem is for all of us.

replies.body: The Reconnect screen dissapeared after a short amount of time but the match seems to have dissapeared.
